entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
